thread.title: U.S. Trade Leverage With China Is Weakening

author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: U.S. Trade Leverage With China Is Weakening
text:
So, it turns out winning trade wars isnâ€™t easy.
As President Trump prepares to unveil wide-ranging tariffs on Chinese imports Thursday, China is readying its own countermeasures, including potential levies on big-ticket U.S. farm exports like soybeans, hogs and cereal crop sorghum. Not coincidentally, those are all items produced mainly by Farm Belt states that overwhelmingly voted for Mr. Trump in 2016.
But...
